pageProduct.name: Travacalm Travel Sickness HO 10 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Travacalm H.O. contains hyoscine hydrobromide only. It is not as long acting as dimenhydrinate and has no caffeine. Therefore, it is ideal for shorter trips, for those who do not want to take a product with caffeine and when drowsiness is desirable. Travacalm H.O. is ideal for travel of shorter duration (less than six hours) and can be used in children over the age of eight years.

Warnings

This medicine may not be right for you. Read the label before purchase. Follow the directions for use. Incorrect use could be harmful. If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional.

Ingredients

Contains: Hyoscine Hydrobromide 300Mcg. Also Contains Lactose And Wheat Starch.

Directions

Directions: Adults - 1 or 2 tablets (Maximum of 4 tablets in 24 hours). Children 8-12 years - Half to one tablet (maximum of 2 tablets in 24 hours).
